oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.geojson

Class GeoJsonRecordInfoProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.geojson.GeoJsonRecordInfoProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, RecordInfoProvider<LongWritable,Text>

    public class GeoJsonRecordInfoProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordInfoProvider<LongWritable,Text>, java.io.Serializable
    RecordInfoProvider for GeoJSON text files. Can be used with GeoJsonInputFormat to create indexes. The geometries SRID and dimensions can be defined. If the objects are features and the user sets the flag addExtraFields to true then the properties will be added to the extra fields.
    Author:
    rinfante
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getExtraFields

        public boolean getExtraFields(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extraFields)
        Description copied from interface: RecordInfoProvider
        If the current record contains other fields different to id and geometry that are desired to be stored for fast access, they should be returned here by adding them to the passed map. An example of an extra field is a field containing text that can be used to find the record's location using the MVSSuggest service.
        Specified by:
        getExtraFields in interface RecordInfoProvider<LongWritable,Text>
        Parameters:
        extraFields - An empty map where the extra fields can be added
        Returns:
        true if extra fields were added. false otherwise.

        Description copied from interface: RecordInfoProvider

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the current record's geometry or null if the record does not have spatial information

        public static int getSrid(Configuration conf)

      • setAddExtraFields

        public static void setAddExtraFields(Configuration conf,
                                     boolean addExtraFields)
        Sets the add extra fields flag. If true then geojson's properties will be added as extra fields in the index.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        addExtraFields - If true then geojson's properties will be added as extra fields in the index

      • setConf

        public void setConf(Configuration conf)

      • setCurrentRecord

        public void setCurrentRecord(LongWritable key,
                             Text value)
        Description copied from interface: RecordInfoProvider
        Sets the record's key and value. The key and value come from the internal InputFormat's RecordReader specified by the user. The record set here should be used to provide the information requested later by calling the getXX() methods. For example: if the InputFormat is TextInputFormat the key will be a LongWrittable and the value will be a Text.
        Specified by:
        setCurrentRecord in interface RecordInfoProvider<LongWritable,Text>
        Parameters:
        key - A record's key
        value - A record's value
